DOC.brief_summary: When people use hand-held power tool , hand arm vibrate along tool hold . People frequently use hand-held power tool may develop injury relate vibration . This study evaluate protective brace design prevent vibration-related hand arm injury .
DOC.brief_title: Protective Brace Prevent Hand Arm Injuries
DOC.detailed_description: Workers use hand-held power tool absorb significant vibration energy arm hand may develop musculoskeletal disorder ( MSDs ) carpal tunnel syndrome hand-arm vibration syndrome . Protective brace may wear decrease incidence occupational MSDs . The National Institute Occupational Safety Health identify key attribute protective brace ; attribute include vibration damping , comfort , non-interference worker dexterity , maintenance safe hand temperature . Most currently available brace adequately address NIOSH requirement . This study evaluate efficacy brace piezoelectric damp material . Participants study fitted brace hand . One brace piezoelectric damp material currently available , off-the-shelf commercial brace . Hand-held joystick handle mount vibration shaker table use simulate power tool use . Participants undergo series test design measure hand acceleration vibration grasp study joystick handle . The test take approximately 30 minute .
